```{r setup, echo = F, include=F, results='asis', warning=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, include=TRUE, message=FALSE, tidy = TRUE, results='asis', warning=FALSE, tidy.opts=list(width.cutoff=60),tidy=TRUE)
```

```{r Load Sources}
library(here)
source(here::here('my-lmer.R'))

titanic_data <- readRDS("titanic data.Rda")

```

```{r Set Outputs, eval= T,include=FALSE}
Console = T
PDF = F
```

```{r Set Controls, eval= T,include=FALSE}
titanic.controls <- c("Age", "SibSp", "Parch")
```

```{r Practice Regressions, eval = FALSE}
my.lmer(titanic_data, 
      dv = "Survived", 
      predictor = "Fare", 
      rdm.effect = "Sex",
      controls = titanic.controls)

```


## Print Regression Table
```{r Regression Table}

PDF = T
Console = F

my.lmer(titanic_data, 
      dv = "Survived", 
      predictor = "Fare", 
      rdm.effect = "Sex",
      controls = titanic.controls,
      caption = "Example Multilevel Regression Table")

```
